description.narrative: Strengthened capacities of the public and private sector entities and the civil society for the efficient application and monitoring of national integrity instruments and standards.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: Indicator: Level of confidence in public institutions

comment.narrative: Baseline: Government: 23%; Parliament: 19%; Local Public Administration: 47%;

1. Impact assessment of Sector Anti-corruption Action Plan in the Fiscal Sector conducted 2. The Anticorruption Initiative Assessment Award system in public sector piloted 3. Award system for promoting integrity standards in private sector piloted 4. At least three public consultations on the NIAS and/or anticorruption sector and local action plans organized 5. Assessment of the implementation of Integrity Plans by state/municipal enterprises conducted 6. At least 5 shadow monitoring reports of the local and sector anticorruption action plans developed by SCOs through the Small Grants Scheme 7. Analytical study on the impact of corruption on the fulfillment of human rights in Moldova drafted 8. Summer school ”Youth against corruption” for 30 active youngsters organized and at least 5 anticorruption volunteers’ initiatives supported. 9. At least 3 public awareness campaigns on anticorruption and integrity conducted and at least 300,000 men and women reached by the capmpaigns.

1. Achieved. Impact assessment of Sector Anti-corruption Action Plan in the Fiscal Sector conducted, published and presented in an on-line public event. 2. Achieved. The AIA Award system in public sector piloted in 8 selected public authorities responsible for the implementation of 9 anticorruption sectorial action plans under NIAS. Results of piloting presented to the assessed institutions within a dedicated workshop. 3. Achieved. Award system for promoting integrity standards in private sector piloted in partnership with NAC through the dedicated nomination within the annual Trademark of the Year Contest organized by the Chamber of Industry and Commerce. 12 companies applied and awarded. 4. Due to COVID19 pandemic restrictions 2 public consultations on sectoral implementation of NIAS in 2 sectors (customs, environmental protection) organized 5. Assessment of the implementation of Integrity Plans by state/municipal enterprises conducted, published and presented in on-line public event 6. Exceeded. shadow monitoring reports on 2 sector anticorruption action plans (customs and environment protection) and shadow monitoring reports on 13 local anticorruption action plans initiated by the NGOs through the Small Grants Scheme to be presented in February 2021. 7. Achieved. First draft of the study on the impact of corruption on the fulfillment of human rights in Moldova submitted. 8. Exceeded. 93 persons (61 young girls and 29 young boys) participated in the on-line summer school. 5 anticorruption volunteers’ initiatives supported, including several activities at the country level and on-line in the COVID19 context. 9. Exceeded. 5 complex public awareness campaigns conducted and an estimated number of at least 500,000 men and women reached via TV posts, social media and off-line activities.

1. Third gender-sensitive NIAS impact monitoring survey conducted 2. On-line training course Institutional Integrity policies and Anti-corruption Standards for civil servants finalized and piloted 3. Analytical study on the efficiency of the anticorruption proofing of legislation during 2019-2020 elaborated and published 4. The Anticorruption Initiative Assessment Award system in public sector implemented 5. Impact assessment of the Sector Anti-corruption Action Plan in the Environmen Protection Sector conducted 6. Award system for promoting integrity standards in private sector implemented 7. Analytical study on the impact of corruption on the fulfilment of human rights in Moldova finalized and published 8. At least 5 anticorruption volunteers’ initiatives supported.

1. Achieved. Third gender-sensitive NIAS impact monitoring survey conducted 2. Achieved. On-line training course Institutional Integrity policies and Anti-corruption Standards for civil servants finalized and piloted in two public institutions: National Probation Authority (186 persons), National Social Insurance Office (100 persons). 3. Achieved. Analytical study on the efficiency of the anticorruption proofing of legislation during 2019-2020 elaborated, published and presented in on-line public event. 4. Achieved. The Anticorruption Initiative Assessment Award system in public sector implemented 5. Achieved. Impact assessment of Sector Anti-corruption Action Plan in the Environment Protection Sector conducted, published and presented in on-line public presentation 6. Achieved. Award system for promoting integrity standards in private sector implemented 7. Achieved. Analytical study on the impact of corruption on the fulfilment of human rights in Moldova finalized, published and presented in on-line public presentation 8. Achieved. 5 anticorruption volunteers’ initiatives supported (Integrity quizzes, promo videos for Integrity game, flashmob on the Youth Day, on-line AC Ideas Club).
